translations: 外屋；屋外厕所；附属建筑物

sentences.sentence: I had to go to the toilet, but I didn't want to use that awful outhouse. So I went off in the woods.
sentences.translation: 我不得不上卫生间，但是我不想用那糟糕的户外厕所，所以我到树林里去了。

sentences.sentence: Outhouse racing has its own World Championship.
sentences.translation: 户外赛车有自己的世界锦标赛。

sentences.sentence: Why don't we just patch on an outhouse in the back yard?
sentences.translation: 我们为什么不在房屋的后院盖一个呢？
